name: df-ovoln
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5
body: |- wceq(covoln, cmpt(s0, cfn, cmpt(s1, cpw(co(cr, cmap, cv(s0))), cif(nat0, cinf(crab(s2, cxr, wrex(s3, co(co(cxp(cr, cr), cmap, cv(s0)), cmap, cn), wa(wss(cv(s1), ciun(s4, cn, cixp(s5, cv(s0), cfv(ccom(cico, cfv(cv(s3), cv(s4))), cv(s5))))), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(csumge0, cmpt(s4, cn, cprod(s5, cv(s0), cfv(cvol, cfv(ccom(cico, cfv(cv(s3), cv(s4))), cv(s5)))))))))), cxr, clt), wceq(cv(s0), emptycls)))))
comment: Define the outer measure for the space of multidimensional real numbers. The cardinality of ` x ` is the dimension of the space modeled. Definition 115C of [Fremlin1] p. 30. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Oct-2020.)
